summary.span: 在可自定义的网格中显示数据。

span.span: Displays data in a customizable grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks @No__t-0 控件提供了一个可自定义的表，用于显示数据。The control provides a customizable table for displaying data. @No__t-0 类允许通过使用属性（如 、、 和 @no__t）自定义单元格、行、列和边框。The class allows customization of cells, rows, columns, and borders through the use of properties such as , , , and . 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的基本格式设置和样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/basic-formatting-and-styling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Basic Formatting and Styling in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/basic-formatting-and-styling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 您可以使用 @no__t 0 控件来显示包含或不包含基础数据源的数据。You can use a control to display data with or without an underlying data source. 如果没有指定数据源，则可以创建包含数据的列和行，并将它们直接添加到使用 和 属性的 @no__t。Without specifying a data source, you can create columns and rows that contain data and add them directly to the using the and properties. 你还可以使用 集合来访问 @no__t 1 对象，并使用 @no__t 2 属性直接读取或写入单元格值。You can also use the collection to access objects and the property to read or write cell values directly. @No__t-0 索引器还提供对单元格的直接访问。The indexer also provides direct access to cells. 作为手动填充控件的替代方法，您可以将 和 @no__t 属性设置为将 @no__t 2 绑定到数据源，并使用数据自动填充该数据源。As an alternative to populating the control manually, you can set the and properties to bind the to a data source and automatically populate it with data. 有关详细信息，请参阅在[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中显示数据](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Displaying Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 处理大量数据时，可以将 属性设置为 `true` 以显示可用数据的子集。When working with very large amounts of data, you can set the property to `true` to display a subset of the available data. 虚拟模式要求实现 控件的数据缓存。Virtual mode requires the implementation of a data cache from which the control is populated. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的数据显示模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/data-display-modes-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Data Display Modes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/data-display-modes-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关 控件中可用功能的其他信息，请参阅[DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/datagridview-control-windows-forms.md)。For additional information about the features available in the control, see [DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/datagridview-control-windows-forms.md). 下表提供了指向常见任务的直接链接。The following table provides direct links to common tasks. - [如何：将数据绑定到 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbk67b6z\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbk67b6z\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：向 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的各个单元格添加工具提示](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2249cf0a\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Add ToolTips to Individual Cells in a Windows Forms DataGridView Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2249cf0a\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中设置字体和颜色样式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z2akwyy7\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Set Font and Color Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z2akwyy7\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：使用设计器更改 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 列类型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/053656ss\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Change the Type of a Windows Forms DataGridView Column Using the Designer](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/053656ss\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：使用设计器将数据绑定到 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/33w255ac\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control Using the Designer](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/33w255ac\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：使用设计器设置 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的默认单元格样式和数据格式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/95y5fz2x\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Set Default Cell Styles and Data Formats for the Windows Forms DataGridView Control Using the Designer](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/95y5fz2x\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中设置数据格式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9x2790s\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Format Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9x2790s\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [演练：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中验证数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ykdxa0bc\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[Walkthrough: Validating Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ykdxa0bc\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中自定义数据格式设置](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z1cc356h\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z1cc356h\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [演练：使用两个 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件创建主窗体/详细信息窗体](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/y8c0cxey\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[Walkthrough: Creating a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/y8c0cxey\(v=vs.110\).aspx) 尽管 控件替换以前版本的 @no__t 1 控件并添加功能，但如果你选择，则将保留 @no__t 2 控件以实现向后兼容性和将来使用。Although the control replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, the control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件与 DataGrid 控件之间的区别](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md)。For more information, see [Differences Between the Windows Forms DataGridView and DataGrid Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md). > [!NOTE] > @No__t 0 的控件从 @no__t 3 继承了 @no__t 1 和 @no__t 2 属性，但仅支持 @no__t 属性。The control inherits both the and properties from , but supports only the property. 将 属性与 @no__t 控件结合使用不起作用。Using the property with the control has no effect. ## Examples remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用列重定位时，用户可以将列标题拖到新位置。When column repositioning is enabled, users can drag a column header to a new position. 请注意，冻结和未冻结的列形成两个不同的组;用户可以重新定位组中的列，但不能将列从一个组移到另一个组。Note that frozen and unfrozen columns form two separate groups; users can reposition columns within a group, but cannot move a column from one group to the other. > [!NOTE] > @No__t 0 的控件不支持双缓冲。The control does not support double buffering. 如果在派生的 控件中将 设置为 `true`，则在对行、列或标题进行调整或对列重新排序时，用户不会收到视觉反馈。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在主要用于显示的 @no__t 0 控件中使用此属性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，控件的可视外观是通过多种方式自定义的，并且控件配置为具有有限的交互功能。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自 类概述中提供的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可防止用户手动更改列宽。Use this property to prevent users from manually changing column widths. 这很有用，例如，对于仅限显示的列，其中的数据将被加载一次并且列在该时间调整大小。This is useful, for example, with display-only columns where data is loaded once and columns are resized at that time. 有关用户调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about user resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > @No__t 0 的控件不支持双缓冲。The control does not support double buffering. 如果在派生的 控件中将 设置为 `true`，则在对行、列或标题进行调整或对列重新排序时，用户不会收到视觉反馈。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在主要用于显示的 @no__t 0 控件中使用此属性。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，控件的可视外观是通过多种方式自定义的，并且控件配置为具有有限的交互功能。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自 类概述中提供的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks @No__t-0 控件使用单元格 @no__t 属性指示的样式显示单元格，该属性从类型 的其他属性继承样式。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 对于包含奇数索引号的行中的单元格，通过 属性指定的样式将覆盖通过 、 和 @no__t 指定的样式，并由通过 @no__t 和 @no__t 属性指定的样式重写。For cells in rows with odd index numbers, the styles specified through the property override the styles specified through the , , and , and are overridden by the styles specified through the and properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 获取此属性时，如果尚未访问该属性，则将创建具有默认值的 @no__t 0。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed. 在为多个行获取此属性时，这可能会影响性能。This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows. 请尽可能使用单个 @no__t 为多行设置此属性。Whenever possible, use a single to set this property for multiple rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性在 控件中创建帐目型效果。The following code example illustrates how to use this property to create a ledger effect in a control. 此示例摘自 类概述中提供的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `true`，并设置或更改 @no__t 或 属性，则会自动生成列。Columns are automatically generated when this property is set to `true` and the or properties are set or changed. 在 属性从 @no__t 更改为 `true` 时，还可以自动生成列。Columns can also be automatically generated when the property is changed from `false` to `true`. 如果此属性 `true`，并且 发生更改，因此存在与以前 值的列不匹配的列，则将放弃不匹配列中的数据。If this property is `true` and the changes so there are columns that do not match the columns of the previous value, data in the unmatched columns is discarded. 如果未设置 或 @no__t 属性，则忽略此属性。This property is ignored if the or properties are not set. 如果 @no__t 设置为 `true`，则 @no__t 2 控件将为数据源中的对象的每个公共属性生成一列。When is set to `true`, the control generates one column for each public property of the objects in the data source. 如果绑定对象实现 接口，则该控件会为 方法返回的每个属性生成一列。If the bound objects implement the interface, the control generates one column for each property returned by the method. 每个列标题将包含列所表示的属性名称的值。Each column header will contain the value of the property name the column represents. 如果设置了 属性，但将 @no__t 设置为 `false`，则必须手动添加列。If you set the property but set to `false`, you must add columns manually. 可以通过将 属性设置为绑定对象公开的属性名称，将每个已添加的列绑定到数据源。You can bind each added column to the data source by setting the property to the name of a property exposed by the bound objects. > [!NOTE] > 设置 Windows 窗体设计器中的 @no__t 0 会自动将 @no__t 属性设置为 `false`，并为数据源中的每个属性生成代码以添加和绑定列。Setting the in the Windows Forms Designer automatically sets the property to `false` and generates code to add and bind a column for each property in the data source. 在设计时生成的代码等效于下面的示例中所示的手动添加的代码。The code that is generated at design-time is equivalent to the manually added code shown in the following example. 这不同于在运行时自动生成列，这是在 属性设置为 `true` 时发生的。It is not the same as the auto-generation of columns at run-time that occurs when the property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在将 设置为 @no__t 时，手动添加列并将它们绑定到数据源。The following code example demonstrates how to add columns manually and bind them to a data source when you set to `false`. 在此示例中，@no__t 0 的控件绑定到 @no__t 1 业务对象的列表。In this example, a control is bound to a list of `Task` business objects. 然后，将添加列并通过 @no__t 属性将其绑定到 `Task` 属性。Then, columns are added and are bound to `Task` properties through the property. 此示例摘自 [How 中提供的更大示例的一部分：访问 Windows 窗体 DataGridViewComboBoxCell 下拉列表 @ no__t-0 中的对象。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Access Objects in a Windows Forms DataGridViewComboBoxCell Drop-Down List](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要控制列的大小调整，此方法非常有用。This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes. 列宽仅针对每个方法调用进行一次调整;如果以后列中的内容发生更改，列将不会自动调整。The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust. 若要调整所有列的大小，请使用 方法。To resize all columns, use the method. 若要将列设置为在其内容更改时自动调整大小，请使用 @no__t 或 @no__t 属性的列。To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the property or the column property. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此方法来使列宽足够大以容纳新的单元值。The following code example uses this method to make the column width large enough to accommodate a new cell value. 此示例摘自 [How 中提供的更大示例的一部分：操作 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件 @ no__t 中的行。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要控制列的大小调整，此方法非常有用。This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes. 列宽仅针对每个方法调用进行一次调整;如果以后列中的内容发生更改，列将不会自动调整。The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust. 若要调整所有列的大小，请使用 方法。To resize all columns, use the method. 若要将列设置为在其内容更改时自动调整大小，请使用 @no__t 或 @no__t 属性的列。To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the property or the column property. 此重载允许您指定调整大小模式，该模式基于有限单元格集中的值（例如，仅显示的行中的值）计算新的宽度。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 这会提高控件包含大量行时的性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此方法来使列宽足够大以容纳新的单元值。The following code example uses this method to make the column width large enough to accommodate a new cell value. 此示例摘自 [How 中提供的更大示例的一部分：操作 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件 @ no__t 中的行。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要控制列的大小调整，此方法非常有用。This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes. 列宽仅针对每个方法调用进行一次调整;如果以后列中的内容发生更改，列将不会自动调整。The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust. 若要调整所有列的大小，请使用 方法。To resize all columns, use the method. 若要将列设置为在其内容更改时自动调整大小，请使用 @no__t 或 @no__t 属性的列。To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the property or the column property. 此重载允许您指定调整大小模式，该模式基于有限单元格集中的值（例如，仅显示的行中的值）计算新的宽度。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 这会提高控件包含大量行时的性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 此重载受到保护，旨在使你能够在派生 @no__t 0 类中实现理想的单元格高度与宽度的比率。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果 `fixedHeight` @no__t 为-1，则将根据你将调用第二 @no__t 或 @no__t 方法的预期来计算列宽。If `fixedHeight` is `false`, the column width will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the or method next. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要控制列标题调整的时间，此方法非常有用。This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize. 列标题的高度仅在每个方法调用中进行了一次调整;如果以后列标题的内容发生更改，则列标题不会自动调整。The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust. 若要将列标题设置为在其内容更改时自动调整大小，请使用 属性。To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 当调整列标题的大小时，若要将单元格内容换行，则单元格的有效单元格样式必须将 属性值设置 @no__t。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在按钮单击时调整列标题和行的大小。The following code example demonstrates how to resize column headers and rows as a result of a button click. span.span: to calculate the new height based on the current width of the specified column; to calculate the height with the expectation that the column width will also be adjusted.

summary.span: 基于指定列中标题内容的更改来调整列标题的高度，还可以选择在列和/或行标题的宽度随后进行调整的假定条件下计算高度。

span.span: Adjusts the height of the column headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified column, optionally calculating the height with the expectation that the column and/or row header widths will subsequently be adjusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要控制列标题调整的时间，如果用户编辑或更改了绑定数据源，则只更改指定列中标题的内容。This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified column have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source. 如果内容更改需要列标题的高度，则仅对每个方法调用进行一次调整;如果以后列标题的内容发生更改，则列标题不会自动调整。The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust. 若要将列标题设置为在其内容更改时自动调整大小，请使用 属性。To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 当调整列标题的大小时，若要将单元格内容换行，则单元格的有效单元格样式必须将 属性值设置 @no__t。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 此重载受到保护，旨在使你能够在派生 @no__t 0 类中实现理想的单元格高度与宽度的比率。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果 @no__t 0 或 @no__t 1 参数 `false`，则将计算列标题的高度，并将调用方法，如 和 @no__t，接下来。If the `fixedColumnWidth` or `fixedRowHeadersWidth` parameters are `false`, the height of the column headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the methods such as and next. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

exception.span: 不在 0 到列数减 1 的有效范围内。

span.span: is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要控制列的大小调整，此方法非常有用。This method is useful if you want to control when columns resize. 列宽仅在每个方法调用中进行一次调整;如果之后列中的内容发生更改，则这些列将不会自动调整。The column widths are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the columns later change, the columns will not automatically adjust. 若要调整特定列的大小，请使用 方法。To resize a specific column, use the method. 若要将列设置为在其内容更改时自动调整大小，请使用 @no__t 或 @no__t 属性的列。To set the columns to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property or the column property. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将调整所有列的大小，以适合列和列标题的内容。The following code example resizes all columns to fit the contents of the columns and the column headers. 此代码示例摘自 [How 中提供的一个更大的示例：以编程方式调整单元格大小以适应 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件 @ no__t 中的内容。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要控制行标题的大小调整，此方法非常有用。This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize. 仅对每个方法调用调整行标题的宽度;如果后续行标题的内容发生更改，则不会自动调整行标题。The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust. 若要将行标题设置为在其内容更改时自动调整大小，请使用 属性。To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 此方法允许您指定一个调整大小模式，该模式基于有限的一组标头中的值（例如，仅显示的行中的值）计算新的宽度。This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only. 这会提高控件包含大量行时的性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

summary.span: 使用指定的大小调整模式，基于指定行中标题内容的更改调整行标题的宽度。

span.span: Adjusts the width of the row headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified row and using the specified size mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要控制行标题调整行标题的时间，如果用户编辑或更改了绑定数据源，则此方法很有用。This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified row have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source. 如果内容更改需要行标题，则只对每个方法调用调整行标题的宽度;如果后续行标题的内容发生更改，则不会自动调整行标题。The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust. 若要将行标题设置为在其内容更改时自动调整大小，请使用 属性。To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 此方法允许您指定一个调整大小模式，该模式基于有限的一组标头中的值（例如，仅显示的行中的值）计算新的宽度。This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only. 这会提高控件包含大量行时的性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何根据第一个行标题的内容的更改调整行标题的宽度。The following code example illustrates how to resize the row header widths based on changes to the contents of the first row header. 此代码示例摘自 [How 中提供的一个更大的示例：以编程方式调整单元格大小以适应 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件 @ no__t 中的内容。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要控制行标题的大小调整，此方法非常有用。This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize. 仅对每个方法调用调整行标题的宽度;如果后续行标题的内容发生更改，则不会自动调整行标题。The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust. 若要将行标题设置为在其内容更改时自动调整大小，请使用 属性。To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 此方法允许您指定一个调整大小模式，该模式基于有限的一组标头中的值（例如，仅显示的行中的值）计算新的宽度。This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only. 这会提高控件包含大量行时的性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 此重载受到保护，旨在使你能够在派生 @no__t 0 类中实现理想的单元格高度与宽度的比率。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果 @no__t 0 或 @no__t 1 参数 @no__t 为-2，则将计算行标题的宽度，前提是将调用方法（如 和 @no__t，接下来）。If the `fixedColumnHeadersHeight` or `fixedRowsHeight` parameters are `false`, the width of the row headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call methods such as and next. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AutoResizeRows() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 调整所有行的高度以适应其所有单元格（包括标题单元格）的内容。

span.span: Adjusts the heights of all rows to fit the contents of all their cells, including the header cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要控制行的调整时间，此方法非常有用。This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize. 对于每个方法调用，行高只进行一次调整;如果后续行的内容发生更改，则不会自动调整行。The row heights are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust. 若要调整特定行的大小，请使用 方法。To resize a specific row, use the method. 若要调整行子集的大小，请使用 重载。To resize a subset of rows, use the overload. 若要将行设置为在其内容更改时自动调整大小，请使用 属性。To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property. 若要在调整行大小时将单元格内容换行到多行，对单元格有效的单元格样式必须将 属性值设置 @no__t。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何基于非标题单元格内容调整所有行的大小。The following code example demonstrates how to resize all rows based on non-header cell content. 此代码示例摘自 [How 中提供的一个更大的示例：以编程方式调整单元格大小以适应 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件 @ no__t 中的内容。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要控制行的大小调整，则此方法非常有用，但您希望只调整行的特定子集的大小，例如那些已更新的绑定记录范围内的行。This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize, but you want to resize only a specific subset of rows, such as those within a range of bound records that have been updated. 仅对每个方法调用调整指定行的行高;如果后续行的内容发生更改，则不会自动调整行。The row heights for the specified rows are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust. 若要调整特定行的大小，请使用 方法。To resize a specific row, use the method. 若要调整所有行的大小，请使用 @no__t 0 方法的其他重载。To resize all rows, use a different overload of the method. 若要将行设置为在其内容更改时自动调整大小，请使用 属性。To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property. 若要在调整行大小时将单元格内容换行到多行，对单元格有效的单元格样式必须将 属性值设置 @no__t。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 此重载允许您指定调整大小模式，该模式基于有限单元格集中的值（例如，仅显示的行中的值）计算新高度。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new heights based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 这会提高控件包含大量行时的性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 此重载受到保护，旨在使你能够在派生 @no__t 0 类中实现理想的单元格高度与宽度的比率。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果 @no__t @no__t 参数为-1，则将计算行高度，并将调用第二 @no__t 或 @no__t 方法。If the `fixedWidth` parameter is `false`, the row heights will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the or method next. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可让你配置控件，以使列宽自动调整为填充控件或调整单元格内容。This property lets you configure the control so that column widths are automatically adjusted either to fill the control or to fit cell contents. 每当控件的宽度发生变化时，都会在填充模式下调整大小。Size adjustments occur in fill mode whenever the width of the control changes. 在基于内容的大小调整模式下，无论何时更改单元格内容，都将发生大小调整，如果启用 ，则每当行高发生变化时。In content-based sizing modes, size adjustments occur whenever cell contents change or, if is enabled, whenever row heights change. 某些基于内容的大小调整模式允许您将调整大小限制为当前显示的行，以便提高性能。Some content-based sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance. 若要更改单个列的大小调整模式，请设置其 属性。To change the sizing mode for an individual column, set its property. 此属性的默认值为 ，指示列继承控件的行为及其 @no__t 属性值。The default value of this property is , indicating that the column inherits its behavior and its property value from the control. 填充模式中的列以其 属性值指示的比例除以可用控件的宽度。Columns in fill mode divide the available control width in proportions indicated by their property values. 填充模式可用的宽度是通过从控件工作区的宽度减去所有其他列的宽度来确定的。The width available for fill mode is determined by subtracting the widths of all other columns from the width of the client area of the control. 如果此宽度小于所有填充模式列的组合 @no__t 值（0），则将显示水平滚动条，所有填充模式列都以最小宽度显示，并禁用用户列大小调整。If this width is smaller than the combined values of all fill-mode columns, the horizontal scroll bar is displayed, all fill-mode columns are shown with their minimum widths, and user column-resizing is disabled. 有关列填充模式的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列填充模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 只有 @no__t 值为 `true` 的列自动调整大小，更改列的可见性不会导致调整大小。Only columns with a property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a column does not cause resizing to occur. 此外，如果将列设置为自动调整大小，则用户无法用鼠标调整列宽。Additionally, when columns are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the column widths with the mouse. 若要以编程方式调整列宽，请使用 或 @no__t 方法，或设置列 属性。To adjust column widths programmatically, use the or methods or set the column property. 有关基于内容的自动调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在主/从方案中使用此属性，这两个 @no__t 0 控件在父/子关系中显示两个表中的数据。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a master/detail scenario where two controls display data from two tables in a parent/child relationship. 在此示例中，主控件的列大小调整模式为 ，列宽以编程方式初始化，以适合加载的值。In this example, the column sizing mode for the master control is , and the column widths are programmatically initialized to fit the loaded values. 详细信息控件设置为自动列大小调整模式，以便每当值更改时（例如，当用户更改父表中的当前行时），列就会自动进行调整。The details control is set to an automatic column sizing mode so that columns will adjust automatically whenever the values change (for example, when the user changes the current row in the parent table). 此示例摘自 [How 中提供的更大示例的一部分：使用两个 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件 @ no__t 创建主/详细信息窗体 @。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Create a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/create-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMasterDetails#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMasterDetails/CS/masterdetails.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMasterDetails#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMasterDetails/VB/masterdetails.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果单元格未能进入编辑模式，则此方法返回 `false`。This method returns `false` if the cell fails to enter edit mode, which can happen for a number of reasons. 如果当前单元格为只读，则此方法返回 `false`。This method returns `false` if the current cell is read-only. 如果单元 属性为 `null` （表示单元格不能承载编辑控件）并且单元类型未实现 @no__t 3 接口，则它也会返回 `false`。It also returns `false` if the cell property is `null` (meaning the cell cannot host an editing control) and the cell type does not implement the interface. 如果单元支持编辑，则此方法将引发 事件，可以取消该事件，并在事件处理程序取消编辑时返回 `false`。If the cell supports editing, this method raises the event, which can be canceled, and returns `false` if an event handler cancels the edit. 如果未取消编辑并且单元格可以承载编辑控件，则此方法将初始化控件并显示该控件。If the edit is not canceled and the cell can host an editing control, this method initializes the control and displays it. 如果初始化失败，则此方法返回 `false`。If the initialization fails, this method returns `false`. 如果单元格成功进入编辑模式，则 属性返回 `true`。If the cell successfully enters edit mode, the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of this method. summary.span: 在 控件的 属性为 并且取消行中的编辑时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property of a control is and the cancels edits in a row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 @no__t 为虚拟模式，则默认情况下会将更改提交到单元级别的数据缓存。When the is in virtual mode, changes are committed to the data cache at the cell level by default. 实现行级事务时，可以使用 @no__t 0 事件。The event can be used when implementing row-level transactions. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为虚拟模式下的 @no__t 0 控件处理此事件。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event for a control in virtual mode. 当控件处于编辑模式时，@no__t 的变量将保留正在编辑的行的索引，并且 @no__t 1 变量保存对对应于该行的客户对象的引用。When the control is in edit mode, the `rowInEdit` variable holds the index of the row being edited, and the `customerInEdit` variable holds a reference to a Customer object corresponding to that row. 当用户取消编辑模式时，可以放弃此对象。When the user cancels out of edit mode, this object can be discarded. 但是，如果用户正在编辑的行是新记录的行，则将放弃旧的 Customer 对象并将其替换为新的对象，以便用户可以再次开始编辑。If the row the user was editing is the row for new records, however, the old Customer object is discarded and replaced with a new one so that the user can begin making edits again. 此示例是 [Walkthrough 中提供的一个更大示例的一部分：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件 @ no__t 中实现虚拟模式。This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Implementing Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md). MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellClick As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 在单元格的任何部分被单击时发生。

span.span: Occurs when any part of a cell is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在单击单元格的任何部分（包括边框和填充）时发生此事件。This event occurs when any part of a cell is clicked, including borders and padding. 当用户按下并释放空格键，而按钮单元格或复选框单元格有焦点时，也会发生这种情况，如果在按下空格键时单击该单元格，则会对这些单元格类型发生两次。It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACE key while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell is clicked while pressing the SPACE key. 若要确定何时单击单元格内容，请处理 事件。To determine when the cell contents are clicked, handle the event. 此事件不会接收有关鼠标位置的信息。This event does not receive information about the mouse position. 如果事件处理程序需要有关鼠标位置的信息，请使用 @no__t 0 事件。If the event handler needs information about the mouse position, use the event. 若要在 中单击，此事件发生在复选框更改值之前，因此，如果不希望基于当前值计算预期值，则通常会改为处理 @no__t 事件。For clicks in a , this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the event instead. 由于该事件仅在提交用户指定的值时才发生，这通常发生在焦点离开单元格时，您还必须处理 @no__t 0 事件。Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the event. 在该处理程序中，如果当前单元格为复选框单元，请调用 方法并传入 值。In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了在票游戏实现中使用 @no__t 1 控件中的图像列的 @no__t 0 事件处理程序。The following code example shows a event handler in a Tic-Tac-Toe game implementation that uses image columns in a control. 除非游戏结束或已单击该单元格，否则，该事件处理程序会将单元值设置为 `x` 和 @no__t 2 的变量表示的两个 对象之一。Unless the game is over or the cell has already been clicked, the event handler sets the cell value to one of two objects represented by the variables `x` and `o`. 此代码是 [How 中显示的更大示例的一部分：使用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的图像列 @ no__t-0。This code is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#10)]

summary.span: 单击单元格的内容时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the content within a cell is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击单元格内容时发生此事件。This event occurs when the cell content is clicked. 当用户按下并释放空格键而按钮单元格或复选框单元格有焦点时，也会发生这种情况，如果在按空格键时单击单元格内容，将对这些单元格类型发生两次。It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACEBAR while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell content is clicked while pressing the SPACEBAR. 使用此事件检测 @no__t 的 @no__t 或链接单击的按钮。Use this event to detect button clicks for a or link clicks for a . 若要在 中单击，此事件发生在复选框更改值之前，因此，如果不希望基于当前值计算预期值，则通常会改为处理 @no__t 事件。For clicks in a , this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the event instead. 由于该事件仅在提交用户指定的值时才发生，这通常发生在焦点离开单元格时，您还必须处理 @no__t 0 事件。Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the event. 在该处理程序中，如果当前单元格为复选框单元，请调用 方法并传入 值。In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例为此事件提供了一个处理程序，该处理程序确定所单击的单元格是链接单元还是按钮单元格，并作为结果执行相应的操作。The following code example provides a handler for this event that determines whether the clicked cell is a link cell or a button cell and performs the corresponding action as a result. 此示例摘自 类概述主题中提供的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#60](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#60)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#60](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#60)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#60](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#60)]

summary.span: 在需要单元格的快捷菜单时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell's shortcut menu is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当设置了 @no__t 控件 属性或其 @no__t 的属性为 `true` 时，才会发生 @no__t 0 事件。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 处理 @no__t 0 事件时，每当用户右键单击某个单元时，就会显示您在处理程序中指定的快捷菜单。When you handle the event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a cell. 当您想要显示由单元的当前状态或值决定的快捷菜单时，这非常有用。This is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by the current state or value of a cell. 只要以编程方式或用户右键单击单元格来检索 @no__t 属性的值，就会发生 事件。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a cell. 您可以使用 和 属性来确定单元的状态或值，并使用此信息来更改或修改 @no__t 2 属性。You can use the and properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性将用单元 @no__t 的值（即事件值覆盖的单元格）的值初始化。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 处理大量数据时处理 @no__t 0 事件，以避免为多个单元格设置单元格 值时的性能损失。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 您还可以通过设置行 @no__t 或处理 @no__t 1 事件，为单独的行而不是单个单元指定快捷菜单。You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row property or handling the event. 单元 属性设置将覆盖行 @no__t 属性设置，而 @no__t 2 事件会重写 @no__t 3 事件和第 @no__t 行属性设置。The cell property setting overrides the row property setting, and the event overrides both the event and the row property setting. 不过，您可以指定单元格快捷菜单 @no__t 0，以防止重写行快捷菜单。However, you can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 @no__t 0 事件处理程序显示在用户右键单击某个单元格时使用的自定义快捷菜单。The following code example demonstrates how to use a event handler to display a custom shortcut menu used when the user right-clicks a cell. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CPP/sharedrows.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CS/sharedrows.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/VB/sharedrows.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件没有输入焦点，且单击的单元格以前不是当前单元格，则单击一次即可发生此事件。This event may occur twice for a single click if the control does not have input focus and the clicked cell was not previously the current cell. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理此事件以更改当前单元格的 @no__t。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the property of the current cell. 在此示例中，选择背景色在 事件中设置，然后重置为 事件上的 @no__t。In this example the selection background color is set in the event, then reset to on the event. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到包含名为 @no__t 的 @no__t 0 的窗体中，并确保所有事件都与它们的事件处理程序相关联。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. summary.span: 需要单元格的错误文本时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell's error text is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当设置了 @no__t 控件 属性或其 @no__t 的属性为 `true` 时，才会发生 @no__t 0 事件。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 当你希望根据单元格的值或状态确定其错误时，处理 事件很有用。Handling the event is useful when you want to determine the error for a cell depending on its value or state. 处理 事件并在处理程序中指定错误文本时，将在单元格中显示错误标志符号，除非 @no__t 属性设置为 `false` 或单元格处于编辑模式。When you handle the event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode. 当用户将鼠标指针移到错误标志符号上方时，错误文本将显示在工具提示中。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip. 每当检索到 @no__t 的属性值时，也会发生 事件。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved. 您可以使用 和 属性来确定单元的状态或值，并使用此信息来更改或修改 @no__t 2 属性。You can use the and property to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性将用单元 @no__t 的值（即事件值覆盖的单元格）的值初始化。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 处理大量数据时处理 @no__t 0 事件，以避免为多个单元格设置单元格 值时的性能损失。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何为单元创建错误消息，而无需取消行的共享，或者在所有共享单元格上复制单元格错误。The following code example demonstrates how to create error messages for cells without unsharing rows or causing the cell error to be duplicated over all the shared cells. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CPP/sharedrows.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CS/sharedrows.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/VB/sharedrows.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellFormatting As DataGridViewCellFormattingEventHandler

summary.span: 需要设置单元格内容的显示格式时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the contents of a cell need to be formatted for display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 控件将尝试将单元格的值转换为适合显示的格式。By default, the control will attempt to convert a cell's value into a format suitable for display. 例如，它会将数值转换为字符串，以便在文本框单元格中显示。For example, it will convert a numerical value into a string for display in a text box cell. 您可以通过设置属性（如 属性）返回的 @no__t @no__t 的属性，来指示要使用的格式设置约定。You can indicate the formatting convention to use by setting the property of the returned by properties such as the property. 如果标准格式不充分，可以通过处理 事件来自定义格式。If the standard formatting is insufficient, you can customize the formatting by handling the event. 此事件使你可以指示要用于单元显示的精确显示值以及单元格样式，如背景和前景色。This event lets you indicate the exact display value as well as the cell styles, such as background and foreground color, to use for the cell display. 这意味着，无论单元格值本身是否需要设置格式，都可以为任何类型的单元格格式处理此事件。This means you can handle this event for any kind of cell formatting, regardless of whether the cell value itself needs formatting. 每次绘制每个单元格时都会发生 @no__t 0 事件，因此，在处理此事件时，应避免长时间处理。The event occurs every time each cell is painted, so you should avoid lengthy processing when handling this event. 当检索到单元 @no__t 0 或调用其 @no__t 方法时，也会发生此事件。This event also occurs when the cell is retrieved or its method is called. 处理 @no__t 0 事件时，@no__t 属性将用单元值初始化。When you handle the event, the property is initialized with the cell value. 如果提供了从单元值到显示值的自定义转换，请将 属性设置为转换后的值，确保新值的类型为单元 属性指定的类型。If you provide custom conversion from the cell value to the display value, set the property to the converted value, ensuring that the new value is of the type specified by the cell property. 若要指示不需要进一步设置值格式，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To indicate that no further value formatting is necessary, set the property to `true`. 当事件处理程序完成时，如果 @no__t 为-1 或不是正确的类型，或者 属性为 `false`，则使用 、、 和 属性（由 @no__t 返回的单元格样式）设置 @no__t属性，该属性使用单元 `null`0 属性进行初始化。When the event handler completes, if the is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the property is `false`, the is formatted using the , , , and properties of the cell style returned by the property, which is initialized using the cell property. 无论 属性的值如何，都将使用 @no__t 属性返回的对象的显示属性来呈现该单元。Regardless of the value of the property, the display properties of the object returned by the property are used to render the cell. 有关使用 事件进行自定义格式设置的详细信息，请参阅 [How：自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件 @ no__t 中的数据格式设置。For more information about custom formatting using the event, see [How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 若要避免在处理此事件时性能受到影响，请通过事件处理程序的参数而不是直接访问单元来访问单元。To avoid performance penalties when handling this event, access the cell through the parameters of the event handler rather than accessing the cell directly. 若要自定义格式的、用户指定的值到实际单元值的转换，请处理 事件。To customize the conversion of a formatted, user-specified value into an actual cell value, handle the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 @no__t 0 事件。The following code example shows how to handle the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击鼠标按钮时，将发生此事件。This event occurs when the user clicks using any of the mouse buttons. 使用 属性可确定单击了哪个按钮。Use the property to determine which button was clicked. 若要检测某个单元格的内容（如单元中的按钮或链接），请使用 事件。To detect clicks on the contents of a cell, such as a button or link within a cell, use the event. 此事件的处理程序接收鼠标指针位置的列索引和行索引。The handler for this event receives the column index and row index of the mouse pointer position. 若要在 中单击，此事件发生在复选框更改值之前，因此，如果不希望基于当前值计算预期值，则通常会改为处理 @no__t 事件。For clicks in a , this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the event instead. 由于该事件仅在提交用户指定的值时才发生，这通常发生在焦点离开单元格时，您还必须处理 @no__t 0 事件。Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the event. 在该处理程序中，如果当前单元格为复选框单元，请调用 方法并传入 值。In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 @no__t 的事件发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 @no__t 0 替换为 ，或将消息附加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 @no__t 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 @no__t 0 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以处理此事件，以自定义控件中单元格的外观。You can handle this event to customize the appearance of cells in the control. 您可以自己绘制单元格，或绘制单元的特定部分，并使用 @no__t 0 或 @no__t 方法来绘制其他部分。You can paint entire cells yourself, or paint specific parts of cells and use the or methods to paint other parts. 你还可以使用 类通过当前主题绘制标准控件。You can also use the class to paint standard controls using the current theme. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). 如果使用 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，还可以访问可与 @no__t 控件一起使用的大型标准图像库。If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the control. 当处理此事件时，应通过事件处理程序的参数访问单元，而不是直接访问单元。When handling this event, you should access the cell through the parameters of the event handler, rather than access the cell directly. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此事件来自定义特定列中所有单元格的外观。The following code example illustrates how to use this event to customize the appearance of all cells in a particular column. 此代码是 [How 中提供的一个更大示例的一部分：自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件 @ no__t 中单元格的外观。This code is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Cells in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting/VB/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellParsing As DataGridViewCellParsingEventHandler

summary.span: 在单元格值已修改的情况下，当单元格退出编辑模式时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell leaves edit mode if the cell value has been modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 控件将尝试将单元格中显示的用户指定值转换为由 属性指定的类型中的实际基础单元值。By default, the control will attempt to convert a user-specified value displayed in a cell to an actual underlying cell value in the type specified by the cell property. 此转换使用单元格样式 属性返回的格式属性。This conversion uses the formatting properties of the cell style returned by the cell property. 如果标准转换不能满足您的需要，请处理 事件，以提供对所需类型的自定义值转换。If the standard conversion does not meet your needs, handle the event to provide custom value conversion to the required type. 用户可以使用由 属性指定的方法进入编辑模式，并且可以通过移动到另一个单元或按 ENTER 来退出编辑模式，提交对单元格所做的任何更改。Users can enter edit mode using the method specified by the property, and can leave edit mode, committing any changes to a cell, by moving to another cell or by pressing ENTER. 按 ESC 将在提交之前恢复对值所做的任何更改，并且不会发生 @no__t 0 事件。Pressing ESC will revert any changes to the value before it is committed, and the event will not occur. 只有在实际修改了单元格值的情况下（即使最终值与原始值相同），@no__t 0 事件才会发生。The event occurs only if the cell value has actually been modified, even if the final value is the same as the original value. 如果调用 @no__t 0 方法，也会发生这种情况。It also occurs when the method is called. 处理 @no__t 0 事件时，可以自行转换值，也可以自定义默认转换。When you handle the event, you can convert the value yourself or you can customize the default conversion. 例如，你可以使用单元格 方法，通过所选的类型转换器自行转换值。For example, you can convert the value yourself using the cell method with type converters of your choosing. 或者，您可以让默认类型转换器分析值，但是修改 属性返回的对象的 、 和 属性，该属性是使用单元 @no__t 属性进行初始化的。Alternatively, you can let the default type converters parse the value, but modify the , , and properties of the object returned by the property, which is initialized using the cell property. 当你自行转换值时，请将 @no__t 的格式化值替换为 属性指定的类型中已转换的值。When you convert the value yourself, replace the initial, formatted value of the property with the converted value in the type specified by the cell property. 若要指示不需要进一步分析，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To indicate that no further parsing is necessary, set the property to `true`. 当事件处理程序完成时，如果 @no__t 为-1 或不是正确的类型，或者 属性为 `false`，则使用带有默认类型转换器的单元格 方法对 @no__t 进行分析。When the event handler completes, if the is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the property is `false`, the is parsed using the cell method with default type converters. 此方法的默认实现使用传入的单元格样式的 、 和 @no__t 2 属性分析值。The default implementation of this method parses the value using the , , and properties of the cell style passed in. 如果该值不等于 ，则使用 @no__t 属性和传入的类型转换器分析该值。If the value is not equal to , the value is parsed using the property and the type converters passed in. 若要自定义单元格值到格式化值的转换以便显示，请处理 事件。To customize the conversion of a cell value into a formatted value for display, handle the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 @no__t 0 事件。The following code example shows how to handle the summary.span: 需要单元格的工具提示文本时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell's ToolTip text is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当设置了 @no__t 控件 属性或其 @no__t 的属性为 `true` 时，才会发生 @no__t 0 事件。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 处理 @no__t 0 事件时，每当鼠标指针位于单元格上时，就会显示您在处理程序中指定的工具提示文本，并且控件 @no__t 属性值 `true`。When you handle the event, the ToolTip text you specify in the handler is shown whenever the mouse pointer is over a cell and the control property value is `true`. 如果要显示由当前状态或单元值决定的工具提示，则 事件很有用。The event is useful when you want to display ToolTips determined by the current state or value of a cell. 只要检索 @no__t 属性的值（以编程方式或当鼠标指针进入单元格时），就会发生 事件。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the mouse pointer enters a cell. 您可以使用 和 属性来确定单元的状态或值，并使用此信息来更改或修改 @no__t 2 属性。You can use the and properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性将用单元 @no__t 的值（即事件值覆盖的单元格）的值初始化。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 处理大量数据时处理 @no__t 0 事件，以避免为多个单元格设置单元格 值时的性能损失。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 @no__t 0 事件处理程序在数据绑定的 @no__t 1 控件中显示隐藏列的信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use a event handler to display information from hidden columns in a data-bound control. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/CS/Form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/VB/Form1.vb#20)]

span.span: Occurs when a cell loses input focus, enabling content validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取消此事件将取消对当前单元格所做的更改。Canceling this event cancels the changes to the current cell. 如果在数据绑定模式下取消此事件，则不会将新值推送到基础数据源。When this event is canceled in data-bound mode, the new value is not pushed to the underlying data source. 如果在虚拟模式下取消此事件，则不会引发 事件。When this event is canceled in virtual mode, the event will not be raised. 处理 事件以执行验证后处理。Handle the event to perform post-validation processing. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理 事件，以确保仅用户输入正整数。The following code example handles the event to ensure that only positive integers are entered by the user. 此示例是 参考主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. summary.span: 单元格的值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of a cell changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果提交用户指定的值，则会发生 @no__t 0 事件，通常是在焦点离开单元格时发生。The event occurs when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell. 但对于复选框单元格，你通常会希望立即处理更改。In the case of check box cells, however, you will typically want to handle the change immediately. 若要在单击单元格时提交更改，必须处理 事件。To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the event. 在处理程序中，如果当前单元格为复选框单元，请调用 方法并传入 值。In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 更改单元格的值时，不会自动对控件中的行进行排序。Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when a cell value is changed. 若要在用户修改某个单元格时对控件进行排序，请在 @no__t 事件处理程序中调用 方法。To sort the control when the user modifies a cell, call the method in a event handler. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 @no__t 0 事件更新 @no__t 的余额列中的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to update the values in a balance column of a . 此示例是 事件中提供的更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用虚拟模式下的此事件，可使用自定义数据存储区中的数据填充单元，而不会导致行成为非共享行。Use this event in virtual mode to populate cells with data from a custom data store without causing rows to become unshared. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关虚拟模式的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 若要将用户指定的值添加到自定义数据存储，请处理 事件。To add user-specified values to your custom data store, handle the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理 事件，用正整数填充单元格。The following code example handles the event to populate cells with positive integers. 此示例是 参考主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks @No__t 值为-1 时表示列标题，`columnIndexException` 值表示行标题。A `rowIndexException` value of -1 represents a column header, and a `columnIndexException` value of -1 represents a row header. 此方法可用于清除当前所选内容，而无需取消选择由异常索引指示的单元格、行或列。This method is useful to clear the current selection without canceling the selection of the cell, row, or column indicated by the exception indexes. 如果 属性值允许单个单元格选择，则此方法将每个单元格的 @no__t 属性设置为 `false`，排除指定的行和列中的单元格。If the property value allows individual cell selection, this method sets the property of each cell to `false`, excluding the cell in the row and column specified. 如果 属性值允许对整行或列进行选择，此方法还会将每个行或列的 @no__t 属性设置为 `false`，排除包含指定单元格的行或列。If the property value allows full row or column selection, this method also sets the property of each row or column to `false`, excluding the row or column containing the specified cell. 调用此方法时，排除的单元格、行或列可能处于选定状态，也可能不处于选定状态。The excluded cell, row, or column may or may not be in the selected state when this method is called. 如果 @no__t @no__t 参数值为-1，则此方法将选择此参数。This method selects it if the `selectExceptionElement` parameter value is `true`. 根据选择模式，还可以选择整个行或列作为结果。Depending on the selection mode, the entire row or column may also be selected as a result.

remarks.format: ## Remarks @No__t-0 控件将每个所选单元格的文本表示形式复制到剪贴板。The control copies the text representation of each selected cell to the Clipboard. 此值是转换为字符串的单元值; 对于图像单元，该值为 属性的值。This value is the cell value converted to a string or, for image cells, the value of the property. 将值复制到剪贴板中 、、 和 格式。Values are copied to the Clipboard in , , , and formats. 这些格式适用于将内容粘贴到记事本、Microsoft Excel 和 [!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/includes/ofprword-md.md)] 等应用程序中。These formats are useful for pasting content into applications such as Notepad, Microsoft Excel, and [!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/includes/ofprword-md.md)]. @No__t-0 控件复制包含所有所选单元的最小矩形中包含的单元。The control copies the cells contained in the smallest rectangle that includes all selected cells. 不包含任何选定单元格的行和列不会在复制的数据中表示。Rows and columns that do not contain any selected cells are not represented in the copied data. 其余行和列中未选定的单元格由空白占位符表示。Any unselected cells in the remaining rows and columns are represented by blank placeholders. 根据复制模式和选择模式，还可以复制复制的行和列的标头值。Depending on the copy mode and the selection mode, header values for the copied rows and columns may be copied, as well. 当用户复制内容时，@no__t 的控件向剪贴板添加 @no__t。When users copy content, the control adds a to the Clipboard. 此数据对象从 方法中检索。This data object is retrieved from the method. 如果要以编程方式将数据对象添加到剪贴板，则可以调用此方法。You can call this method when you want to programmatically add the data object to the Clipboard. @No__t-0 方法通过调用 方法检索单个单元格的值。The method retrieves values for individual cells by calling the method. 您可以在派生类中重写这些方法中的一个或两个，以自定义复制单元格的布局或支持其他数据格式。You can override either or both of these methods in derived classes to customize the layout of copied cells or to support additional data formats. 有关剪贴板操作和数据格式的详细信息，请参阅 类。For more information about Clipboard operations and data formats, see the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 @no__t 0 的控件中启用复制。The following code example demonstrates how to enable copying in the control. 此示例摘自 [How 中提供的更大示例的一部分：使用户能够将多个单元格从 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件 @ no__t 复制到剪贴板。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Enable Users to Copy Multiple Cells to the Clipboard from the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md). summary.span: 用户双击两列之间的分隔符时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user double-clicks a divider between two columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此事件自定义用户双击列分隔符时发生的自动调整大小行为。You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a column divider. 例如，你可以处理此事件以编程方式仅基于当前可见行中的内容来调整列的大小，以避免在处理大量行时对默认行为产生的性能影响。For example, you can handle this event to programmatically resize columns based only on the content in the rows that are currently visible, avoiding a performance impact with the default behavior when working with a large number of rows. 列 属性不会扩展用户双击的区域。The column property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click. 如果通过使用此属性增加了分隔线的宽度，则当用户双击分隔符与相邻列之间的边界时发生此事件。If the width of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 @no__t 的事件发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 @no__t 0 替换为 ，或将消息附加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 @no__t 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 @no__t 0 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 当单击 中的列标题时，默认行为是根据所单击的列对网格行进行排序，或者如果网格已经按被单击的列进行排序，则为反转排序顺序。When a column heading is clicked in a , the default behavior is to order the grid rows based on the clicked column, or to reverse the sort order if the grid is already sorted by the clicked column. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此事件来执行编程排序，以便在默认行为已禁用时模拟单击 @no__t 的默认行为。The following code example demonstrates how to use this event to perform a programmatic sort that emulates the default behavior of clicking a when the default behavior has been disabled. 在此示例中，@no__t 设置为 ，因此单击 将选择列的内容。In this example, the is set to , so clicking the selects the contents of the column. 为了使示例代码按预期运行，每次将数据加载到 时，都需要更改默认列标题单击行为。For the example code to function as intended, the default column header click behavior needs to be changed each time the data is loaded into the . 添加一个 @no__t 0 事件处理程序以提供更改默认行为的代码。Add a event handler to provide the code that changes the default behavior. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到包含名为 @no__t 的 @no__t 0 的窗体中，并确保所有事件都与它们的事件处理程序相关联。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以调整列标题的高度，以及它是由用户调整还是根据标题的内容自动调整。

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 ，用户将无法调整列标题的高度。When this property is set to , the height of the column headers cannot be adjusted by the user. 若要以编程方式调整列标题的高度，请使用 @no__t 的方法或设置 @no__t 的属性。To adjust the height of the column headers programmatically, use the method or set the property. 若要设置行标题的大小调整模式，请使用 属性。To set the sizing mode for the row headers, use the property. 当调整列标题的大小时，若要将单元格内容换行，则单元格的有效单元格样式必须将 属性值设置 @no__t。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 有关标头大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > @No__t 0 的控件不支持双缓冲。The control does not support double buffering. 如果在派生的 控件中将 设置为 `true`，则在对行、列或标题进行调整或对列重新排序时，用户不会收到视觉反馈。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在主要用于显示的 @no__t 0 控件中使用此属性。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，控件的可视外观是通过多种方式自定义的，并且控件配置为具有有限的交互功能。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自 类概述中提供的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法尝试将格式的、用户指定的值转换为基础单元数据类型。This method attempts to convert the formatted, user-specified value to the underlying cell data type. 为此，它会引发 @no__t 0 事件，你可以处理该事件以自定义类型转换。To do this, it raises the event, which you can handle to customize the type conversion. 否则，将使用默认类型转换器。Otherwise, default type converters are used. 如果未处理 @no__t 0 事件来阻止该事件，则转换错误可能会导致异常。Conversion errors may result in an exception if the event is not handled to prevent it. 如果值已成功转换，则将其提交到数据存储，如果 @no__t 属性值为 @no__t，则为非数据绑定单元引发 事件。If the value is successfully converted, it is committed to the data store, raising the event for non-data-bound cells when the property value is `true`. 如果值已成功提交，则会发生 @no__t 0 事件。If the value is successfully committed, the event occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用 @no__t 事件处理程序中的 方法，以引发 @no__t 2 事件。The following code example calls the method within a event handler to raise the event. 此代码示例摘自 [How 中提供的一个更大的示例：禁用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件 @ no__t 中的按钮列中的按钮。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Disable Buttons in a Button Column in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md). summary.span: 获取或设置当前处于活动状态的单元格。

span.span: Gets or sets the currently active cell.

value.span: 表示当前单元格的 ，如果没有当前单元格，则为 。

span.span: The that represents the current cell, or if there is no current cell.

value.span: 默认值是第一列中的第一个单元格，如果控件中没有单元格，则为 。

span.span: The default is the first cell in the first column or if there are no cells in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将单元格设置为当前单元格时，它将滚动到视图（如果当前未显示）。When you set a cell as the current cell, it will scroll into view if it is not currently displayed. 当前单元不能是标题单元、禁用的单元格或隐藏的行或列中的单元。The current cell cannot be a header cell, a disabled cell, or a cell in a hidden row or column. 您可以将此属性设置为 `null` 以暂时删除聚焦框，但当控件接收焦点并且此属性的值 @no__t 为时，它会自动设置为 属性的值。You can set this property to `null` to temporarily remove the focus rectangle, but when the control receives focus and the value of this property is `null`, it is automatically set to the value of the property. 更改此属性的值时，@no__t @no__t 事件发生在1事件之前。When you change the value of this property, the event occurs before the event. 此时访问 @no__t @no__t 属性的任何事件处理程序都将获得其以前的值。Any event handler accessing the property at this time will get its previous value. 将 绑定到外部数据源时，此属性将重置为其默认值。When you bind the to an external data source, this property is reset to its default value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何通过将 属性设置为通过 @no__t 属性检索到的单元格来确保当前单元格在排序后可见。The following code example illustrates how to ensure that the current cell is visible after sorting by setting the property to the cell retrieved through the property. 此代码仅适用于未绑定的 控件。This code works only with an unbound control. 如果将 @no__t 0 控件绑定到外部数据源，则在排序时不会自动保留当前单元格。With a control bound to an external data source, the current cell is not automatically persisted when sorting. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为 @no__t 的 @no__t 0 的窗体中。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`. 在C#中，还必须将 事件连接到事件处理程序。In C#, you must also connect the event to the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#150)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#150)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以确定当前单元格的行和列，而无需直接访问该单元。Use this property to determine the row and column of the current cell without accessing the cell directly. 这有助于避免取消共享共享行。This is useful to avoid unsharing shared rows. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在行绘制方案中使用 属性。The following code example illustrates how to use the property in a row-painting scenario. 在此示例中，此属性用于存储当前单元格的行索引。In the example, this property is used to store the row index of the current cell. 当用户将当前单元格更改为其他行时，将强制该行自行重绘。When the user changes the current cell to a different row, the row is forced to repaint itself. 此代码是 [How 中提供的一个更大示例的一部分：自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件 @ no__t 中的行的外观。This code is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
